target: So much happened in the last few days...
Good morning, babe! You look so cute asleep.
Eh?!
Shivers ran through Sarah's body from the surprise, and she jumped onto her legs.
Sarah's blurred vision didn't let her see who was with her at first, but finally she realised it was Stukov.
How long have you been here? Have you been watching me sleep?
Hahaha.
Stop it, of course not! I've just came, didn't think you would still be asleep. Exhausted yourself much yesterday?
Hahaha.
S-shut up!
If you say so. I think it's time for your next test, since you're learning on the fly, so here's a gift for you.
Huh??? The next test? Gift?
(Oh god, what perverted ideas did he get this time...)
I don't want any presents from you.
Well, you see, it's part of the next test, so you'll have to take it.
You could take the next test without it, but don't you want to escape sooner rather than later?
Are you kidding me?
Of course not.
Will this really help me?
Absolutely.
Alright, give it to me.
Stukov came up to Sarah and handed her a container with Sarah's present.
(Hm, what a strange container...)
You might be wondering, what are things like this doing in a zerg base?
Well, you see, I have a great dealer of such 'products'.
Maybe I'll let you meet him one day and you'll be able to order what you need by yourself.
(Could that be my chance to leave this place?)
(Aren't you tired of yourself yet?)
(No!)
Sarah looks inside the container and notices what the 'present' is.
Are... Are you kidding me?!
Ahahaha!
(Hm, he's got a good taste. I like it.)
(No one asked you!!!)
Your reaction was worthless, just as I imagined it to be!
How can THIS help me get out of here???
As I've told you before, this will help you with your next test.
Which means it will help you get out of here faster.
I'm sure you'll like it. You have plenty of time, don't rush yourself.
You should... 'explore' the gift.
When you're ready, just call me. But I beg you, don't waste a freaking eternity on it.
I think you'll figure out what to do with it quite quickly.
Ahaha!
Such a great day.
Stukov headed to the exit, humming his favorite tune.
Before leaving, he turned around and gave Sarah a wink.
I was right, he did get lots and lots of perverted ideas.
(You said the same about the food. Do I need to remind you of your opinion of it now?)
That's a completely different matter! You can't compare it and this!
(Well, say what you want, but if you want to leave, you should get used to everything around here.)
Item 'container' added to inventory.
It's a sturdy and reliable container, suitable for carrying a variety of things. It's spacious and has a vacuum seal.
There's a small window on its top side which can be used to see what's inside of it. Next to it is a button for opening the lid.
I still can't believe it...
Sarah carefully looks at the window of the container. A set of lacy black underwear is waiting for her inside.
I-I don't like it... What's he planning this time...
I've never worn anything like this before...
It's so weird...
(I believe in you! You can do it!)

After Sarah pressed on the button, the container let out a couple of weird noises, probably due to the vacuum seal disengaging. After it finally opened, Sarah took in the full view of Stukov's 'gift'.
It's even lewder than I thought it was...
How can people even wear such things???
(Let's find out!)
I... I... I don't know...
Item 'Set of underwear' added to inventory
Sarah picked up the set of underwear and examined it closer.
What's this material, why is it so... transparent... Some areas won't be covered at all...
There also were a pair of black lace stockings with a garter belt in the container. Combined with the panties they created a gorgeous sight.
And... and stockings! Damn that pervert!
When I leave this place... Oh how he will pay!
(Ya-ya-ya. Are you finished? Put it on.)
Due to her lack of experience with such clothes and fabrics, it took Sarah some time,but finally she succeeded in getting all of that garment onto her.
Some time later.
Ah... It's... It's so wrong...
I... I'm not ready yet...
(Alright, but don't take too long.)
I'll deal with that later.

Thanks for playing our game, we really hope you liked it. Unfortunately, you've reached the end of the content the current game update contains. Please visit us on {a=https://www.patreon.com/shadow_portal}Patreon{/a} and tell us your opinion on our game.
We're already working on the next update!
Yours respectfully, Shadow Portal team.
Stukov enters Sarah's room.
So, ready for future training?
I... I.. I think so...
Ahaha, no need to worry so much, you've done great so far! I'm sure you'll do even better.
And don't forget what an excellent teacher you have!
Yeah-yeah, whatever...
Ahaha!
What should I do now?
Now, you'll take a test to determine the best way to organise your training.
(Test? I don't even want to imagine what he's got in mind... Though, it's obviously just more perverted stuff...)
What test? How will it go? What will you make me do this time?
Hah, nothing!
Nothing??? What do you mean?
It's a verbal test. All you need to do is answer my questions.
Just... answer your questions?
Yes, but you'll have to answer them honestly. The efficiency of your training depends on it. And you wouldn't want to spend more time than needed here, would you?
Yes...
Great.
Stukov rummaged through his pockets and pulled out some device from it. It would seem that he was going to somehow utilise it to record Sarah's answers.
So, shall we begin?
How many questions will there be?
That doesn't matter. Focus on answering as honestly as possible.
So, we'll start with the easier ones first, so you can get a bit more comfortable before the harder ones come.
Okay...
First question. What kind of sex do you prefer? Oral, vaginal, anal?
(I knew this wasn't going to be an actual test... gr...)
So, how about providing an answer?
Are you sure this is the correct test?
Absolutely. Did you listen to what Mistress said? You have to become more open. And this is just one step in achieving that.
But this is so... fast...
I know, but we aren't just random acquaintances now, you should get used to such topics as soon as possible.
Now, please answer the question finally.
A-alright...
(I can't believe he's making me say that...)
Well... I like oral sex...
Well, aren't you're just full of surprises.
Stukov scribbled something on his tablet.
S-stop...
Alright, next question then.
Do you like to receive or to give it?
Well... I like doing it myself...
Ahaha. Fabulo... ahem... I'll just write that down...
I... like when somebody does it on me...
Uh-huh, okay.
(I can't believe he's making me say that...)
I like vaginal intercourse...
(So basic... Why not anything else?)
Hm, alright...
(I can't believe he's making me say that...)
To be honest...
(Damn, this is harder than I thought it would be...)
Well? Just answer already.
I... I like... {size=-5}anal sex.{/size}
Ahaha, you're just full of surprises!
Great choice, ahem, fantastic choice...
(I can't believe he's making me say that...)
W-well... To be honest, I like everything you've listed...
Yeah, that's a good attitude.
(Jeez, talking about such things... is so weird... but it has to be done...)
Stukov scribbled something on his tablet.
(God, this is so weird...)
Nice, moving on...
Second question. Do you like girls?
Yes, I do like girls.
Heh, so that's why you have that poster on a wall?
No... I prefer living girls...
{size=-2}And she's not exactly my type...{/size}
Well, that was to be expected. That's natural for you, girls.
{size=-2}I do have a specific taste though...{/size}
Yeah? And what would be your type?
Wait, don't say it! I want to guess.
Hm...
I think... You like brunettes? What about Kate Lockwell?
Do I have to answer that question?
*Ahem*, of course! It's all part of the test!
(I'm pretty sure he's just blatantly lying right now...)
Come on, answer already.
Well, yeah, she is my type...
(Why am I even telling him that...)
Ahaha, guessed on the first try! I think I know what your type actually is now.
Aren't you just proud of youself?
You just had to ruin the moment...
I don't like her job though. Nothing but propaganda comes from new programmes...
Heh, well I do and I like her reports too. Ahahah, well, you know what I mean.
(Yuck! I knew he was a pervert, but fapping to news reports!..)
No, wrong guess. She's not my type.
Hm, I thought she'd be the type to rile you up.
No. And I don't like news programmes either. Bit too much lying for my liking...
Heh, well I do and I like her reports too. Ahahah, well, you know what I mean.
(Yuck! I knew he was a pervert, but fapping to news reports!..)
Hm, maybe it's Kyla Velassi? The juicy redhead?
Who is that? I don't know her.
God, you're such a hillbilly...
Well, that's unsurprising. She's not very popular, but she has quite a few fans.
And, let me guess, you are one of them.
Yes.
And you frequently 'watch' her performances...
Exactly. See, you know me so well! Ahahah.

Well, since you don't know her, just say if you like redheads.
Well, yes, I do.
Huh, two reddies going at it, won't that be nice to look at!
Don't even think about it!
Ahem...
We'll talk about that a bit later.
No, I do not like redheads. There's only one redhead and that is me.
Ahahah, that's the spirit!
Even though I was wrong...
Already giving up?
What? No, of course not.
What about the sexy DJ blonde Scarlett?
Scarlett Johansson? She's not a DJ!
What? Who? Sai'mon, is that you messing around in there?
(Have you all gone insane? Go to a doctor then!)
But we are in space, there are no doctors here...

Ooh, that's not a bad idea!
It's an awful idea!
I've never heard of her either...
Damn... How could you've not?
What if I tell you more about her? She's a solid Starcraft player, you know? And she's quite fabulous. I'd just... ahem...
Starcraft? What's that?
(That's the game about our universe...)
...What a stupid a name...
Well, I'll have to agree with you on that. It does sound dumb...
They could've called it 'Stukov's Great Adventure'!
(Starcraft isn't that bad...)
I should've prepared better, gathered more info about them...
Can't you just show her with Sai'mon's help?
Shh! The art's aren't ready. So no, I can not.
Oh, those artists...
Well then, a general question it is. Do you like blondes?
Well yes, I do like blondes. But hair color is just that, a color. There's a lot to a human that should harmonize to be attractive.

But, you know, that doesn't concern you! I'd have a hard on for you regardless your haircolor and much more!
I-idiot... Why don't you just shove those 'compliments'...
Ahah. A girl's got to be proud when she provokes such a reaction, you know? Ahahah!

Wrong again. I don't like blondes at all... Well, it's not that I have something against them, it's just that I don't particularly like them...
Hm, this ain't as easy as it should've been...

(Damn it, why did I tell him that... he'll never let it go...)

Okay...
Stukov displeasedly tapped at his tablet and it lit up for a moment.
No, I do not like girls.

Come on, what's the next question?

Stukov touched his device and it lit up with a different colour, but swiftly returned to its usual state.
So, once more, moving on.
Question number 3. How do you prefer to be treated during sex? Roughly or... wait, what's this?

The second option here is 'gently'...
Give me a moment, I'll fix it

All right now! So, your options are 'roughly' or 'roughly'!

Yes!!! I knew it... Ahahah, I knew you liked it rough!

What? Chose? Well, whatever, you said 'roughly', that's for sure!

Yes! A real man should be gentle and caring! We are fragile beings.

AHAHAH.

Question number 4. How many times per week do you masturbate? 14, 30 or more than 30?

{size=-3}That's what I'm afraid of...{/size}
Well, aren't you curious at all?

Maybe you are interested in how many times I go to the bathroom, huh?
Of course! So, how many?
That was a rhetorical question...

Perverted? Ahaha, we're just warming up, baby!

What? Do you have absolutely nothing else to do?

You've already been dead once. Do you actually care about your health?
Of course.
No, I'm not interested in that.
Well, I fap somewhere around 40 times a week.
I told you I didn't want to know! Why did you tell me that...

Do you like showing off your body to strangers?
Showing my body? W-what do you mean?.. To a stranger?

Ahahaha!
